title: can i sell a chest???
body:
i would like to sell something just to upgrade skin permanent (final boss veigar )
but i have only 1300 orange essence
i got project zed too as shard 
i like zed s skin too 
can i do something in order to get 200 essence????

replies.body: Hmmmmm the only way to get essence is by disenchanting those shards or getting a little bonus drop from chests. It sucks that you're so close and don't have anything else to disenchant, but the next couple chests should have something that would net you that 200 essence!
